name: Kiwi-Lime Pops
author: SandyG
summary: Blend fresh kiwi with lime juice and freeze for a summertime treat.
directions: Cut 5 kiwi in half crosswise and scoop flesh from skins with a spoon
Blend with sugar and lime juice in a blender until pureed, about 15 seconds
Transfer to a measuring cup with a spout and pour into 6 (3-ounce) flat ice pop molds, dividing evenly
Peel remaining kiwi and thinly slice crosswise into 12 slices
Submerge 2 slices in each mold, arranging them so 1 slice presses against each of the mold's wider sides
Cover molds, insert sticks between the slices, and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours and up to 2 weeks
